Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Dennis Schröder?

Dennis Schröder is 31 years old.

Where was Dennis Schröder born?

Dennis Schröder was born in Braunschweig, Germany.

When was Dennis Schröder born?

Dennis Schröder was born on September 15, 1993.

How tall is Dennis Schröder?

Dennis Schröder is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much does Dennis Schröder weigh?

Dennis Schröder weighs 172 lbs (78 kg).

Is Dennis Schröder in the Hall of Fame?

Dennis Schröder is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Dennis Schröder drafted?

Dennis Schröder was drafted by Atlanta Hawks, 1st round (17th pick, 17th overall), 2013 NBA Draft.

What position does Dennis Schröder play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

What is Dennis Schröder's net worth?

Dennis Schröder has made at least $90,141,952 playing professional basketball.

How much does Dennis Schröder make?

Dennis Schröder made $16,000,000 in 2021.

What does Dennis Schröder average?

Dennis Schröder averages 14.2 points, 2.6 rebounds, and 5.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Dennis Schröder have?

Dennis Schröder has won 0 championships.

What is Dennis Schröder's Twitter account?

Dennis Schröder is on Twitter at DS17_FG.

What is Dennis Schröder's Instagram account?

Dennis Schröder is on Instagram at ds17_fg.

What are Dennis Schröder's nicknames?

The Menace is a nickname for Dennis Schröder.
